summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 38th Avenue West, from West Dravus Street to Tilden Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 13822 of the City Council of the City of Seattle as modified by Comptroller's File No. 183107, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
